titles.title: We Are Come To Mount Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are come to Mount Zion,
To the heavenly New Jerusalem,
To an innumerable company of Angels,
To the church of Jesus Christ.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are standing in the heavenlies
In the city of the living God,
In the general assembly
,The church of the First-Born,
Christ at the right hand of God.
